channel.title: 667 Drop Editor
channel.description:
Okay since people are having problems trying to do this ill give you all the things you need there could be error's in the code but use netbeans ied or eclipse to fix it simple :]
Download these file's here: [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/2332928/Drop.java.html]http://www.upload.ee/files/2332928/Drop.java.html[/url] = [b]Drop.java[/b] [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/2332935/dropEditor.java.html]http://www.upload.ee/files/2332935/dropEditor.java.html[/url] = [b]dropEditor.java[/b] [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/2332940/itemDefinitions.java.html]http://www.upload.ee/files/2332940/itemDefinitions.java.html[/url] =[b]itemDefinitions.java[/b] [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/2332945/NPC.java.html]http://www.upload.ee/files/2332945/NPC.java.html[/url] = [b]NPC.java[/b] [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/2332947/NPCDrops.java.html]http://www.upload.ee/files/2332947/NPCDrops.java.html[/url] = [b]NPCDrops.java[/b]
[size=14pt][b]File Locations on where to add these or edit the .java file's:[/b][/size]
[b]*Drop.java location = com/rs/game/npc *dropEditor.java = com/rs/tools *itemDefinitions.java = com/rs/cache/loaders *NPC.java = com/rs/game/npc *NPCDrops.java = com/rs/utils[/b]
Credits: ultikiller20
This is pretty much spoon feeding I will not help you use this or fix the error's so good luck

item.title: 667 Drop Editor
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

Okay since people are having problems trying to do this ill give you all the things you need there could be error’s in the code but use netbeans ied or eclipse to fix it simple :]

Download these file’s here:
http://www.upload.ee/files/2332928/Drop.java.html = Drop.java
http://www.upload.ee/files/2332935/dropEditor.java.html = dropEditor.java
http://www.upload.ee/files/2332940/itemDefinitions.java.html =itemDefinitions.java
http://www.upload.ee/files/2332945/NPC.java.html = NPC.java
http://www.upload.ee/files/2332947/NPCDrops.java.html = NPCDrops.java

[size=14pt]File Locations on where to add these or edit the .java file’s:[/size]

*Drop.java location = com/rs/game/npc
*dropEditor.java = com/rs/tools
*itemDefinitions.java = com/rs/cache/loaders
*NPC.java = com/rs/game/npc
*NPCDrops.java = com/rs/utils

Credits: ultikiller20

This is pretty much spoon feeding I will not help you use this or fix the error’s so good luck

Read full topic
